function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of COVID-19 interventions","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of intervention effectiveness","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate data collection and analysis, consider confounding variables","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Model validation under COVID-19 interventions","Impact":"Inaccurate model predictions leading to ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Validate models against real-world data, incorporate feedback from ongoing interventions","Technologies":"Modeling software, real-time data integration","People":"Data scientists, policymakers","Owner":"Data scientists, policymakers"}]}
